data.name: Cold Bite
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to Cold Bite!

Cold Bite is a top-down shooter in which the player fights endless waves of zombies. Build turrets, level-up, and hold them off as long as you can!



  • Build turrets to aid you in your fight.
  • Level-up and distribute points into speed, money, and fire rate.
  • Fight to the end... if you can.

Cold Bite also supports saving/loading, so you can continue where you left off.

How long can you survive?

data.reviews:
“The survival action, the main purpose of which is to shoot at enemies and various weapons and not allow yourself to be surrounded, while collecting as many kills and points as possible. A fun game for the evening or two.”
Gaming Grandma

“Cold Bite is a top-down shooter with simple pixel graphics and a simple storyline. Game for watch fun. As a good time killer I can safely advise. Rated 7 out of 10.”
Earth in the Porthole

“Cold Bite is a minimal and fun little topdown shooter indie game, survive and take down massive waves of enemies, use some defense (turrets), try to get highscore, a simple action game to pass time.”
Games without Borders
